caption.title: Evolution of the confinement probability I conf as well as the particles distance from the origin for a simulated virus trajectory.
caption.p: The particle moves according to D free until it encounters an AF cluster (top panel, red circles). Due to the higher concentration of AF, the particles diffusion is slowed down to D conf and the particle is confined. Particle confinement is detected by an increase of the confinement probability (middle panel) as well as a plateau in the distance from origin plot (lower panel).
Click here for additional data file.
